TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlPersistenceProviderFactory extends System.ServiceModel.Persistence.PersistenceProviderFactory

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The WF3 types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new WF4 types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 系统提供的 实现，用于创建一个 实例，该实例使用 SQL 数据库存储持久性服务状态数据。

span.span: A system-provided implementation used to create a instance that uses a SQL database to store persisted service state data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示功能完整的持久性服务永久性提供程序的工厂类。The class represents a factory class for a fully-functional, durable service persistence provider. 可以使用此系统提供的提供程序来保留和检索有关持久性的 WCF 服务的状态信息。You can use this system-provided provider to persist and retrieve state information about a durable WCF service. 除了持久性以外， 类创建的提供程序还可以通过从 抽象类继承来实现服务状态数据记录的锁定。In addition to persistence, the provider created by the class implements locking of service state data records by inheriting from the abstract class. 持久性数据交互的方法 (如或) 具有可选参数 (`lockInstance`)，用于定义是释放还是保持相关数据的锁定。Methods that interact with persisted data (such as or ) have an optional parameter (`lockInstance`) that defines whether locks on the data in question are released or maintained. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，由 引发的 异常不隐藏其异常详细信息。 exceptions thrown by do not have their exception details hidden by default. 若要避免出现安全漏洞，可以通过设置会隐藏这些详细信息到`false`。To protect against security vulnerabilities, these details can be hidden by setting to `false`. > [!NOTE] > SQL 永久性提供程序存储和检索 SQL Server 数据库中的数据。The SQL Persistence Provider stores and retrieves data from a SQL Server database. 主机必须创建一个安全的 SQL Server 环境以防止攻击者在数据库中或在应用程序和数据库之间的网络上获取对实例状态的读/写访问权限。The host must create a secure SQL Server environment to protect against attackers gaining read/write access to the instance state either in the database or on the wire between the application and the database.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的构造函数的重载提供用于设置以下各项的参数：Overloads of the constructor for the class provide parameters for setting the following: - 用于访问 SQL 数据库的连接字符串。The connection string used for accessing the SQL database. - 用于定义锁定所有权持续时间的锁定超时。The lock time-out used for defining lock ownership duration. - 持久性数据是序列化为 XML 还是二进制数据。Whether the persistence data is serialized as XML or binary data.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, configured with the specified parameter collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数可以任意指定 `lockTimeout`、`connectionString` 和 `serializeAsText`，无需指定其他构造函数所需的其他参数（例如，指定 `connectionString` 和 `lockTimeout` 参数而无需指定 `serializeAsText` 参数）。This constructor can be used to arbitrarily specify `lockTimeout`, `connectionString`, and `serializeAsText` without specifying the other parameters as required by the other constructors (for example, to specify the `connectionString` and `lockTimeout` parameters without specifying the `serializeAsText` parameter.) ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用参数集合创建 类的新实例。The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the class using a parameters collection. [!code-csharp[SqlPersistenceProviderFactory#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sqlpersistenceproviderfactory/cs/sqlpersistenceproviderfactory.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为`serializeAsText`是`false`，指示该持久性信息序列化为二进制数据。The default value for `serializeAsText` is `false`, which indicates that persistence information is serialized as binary data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类的新实例。The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the class. MemberSignature.Value: public SqlPersistenceProviderFactory (string connectionString, bool serializeAsText, TimeSpan lockTimeout);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string connectionString, bool serializeAsText, valuetype System.TimeSpan lockTimeout) cil managed
Public Sub New (connectionString As String, serializeAsText As Boolean, lockTimeout As TimeSpan)
public: SqlPersistenceProviderFactory(System::String ^ connectionString, bool serializeAsText, TimeSpan lockTimeout);

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 新的永久性提供程序工厂实例的连接参数。

span.span: The connection parameters for the new persistence provider factory instance.

param.name: serializeAsText
param.span: 指定是否将数据序列化为文本而不是二进制数据。

span.span: Specifies whether data is serialized as text rather than binary.

param.name: lockTimeout
param.span: 锁定所有权的超时。

span.span: The time-out for lock ownership.

param.span: 锁定的实例将在此时间段后自动解锁。

span.span: Locked instances are automatically unlocked after this time period.

param.span: 超时值 指明没有使用锁定。

span.span: A time-out of specifies that no locking is used.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，使用指定的连接字符串、 和 参数进行配置。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, configured with the specified connection string, , and parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为`serializeAsText`是`false`，指示该持久性信息序列化为二进制数据。The default value for `serializeAsText` is `false`, which indicates that persistence information is serialized as binary data. 默认值为`lockTimeout`是`TimeSpan.Zero`，未使用指示该锁定。The default value for `lockTimeout` is `TimeSpan.Zero`, which indicates that locking is not used. 如果`TimeSpan.MaxValue`使用，则无限期保持锁定。If `TimeSpan.MaxValue` is used, then locks are maintained indefinitely. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类的新实例。The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the class. [!code-csharp[SqlPersistenceProviderFactory#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sqlpersistenceproviderfactory/cs/sqlpersistenceproviderfactory.cs#0)]

summary.span: 初始化一个新 实例，该实例使用 SQL 数据库作为其持久性存储区。

span.span: Initializes a new instance that uses a SQL database as its persistence store.
A newly-created .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始化的永久性提供程序将使用创建工厂的当前参数（、 和 ），即使在创建永久性提供程序后工厂的参数已发生更改。The initialized persistence provider uses the current parameters of the creating factory (, , and ), even if the factory's parameters are changed after the persistence provider is created. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何执行 `CreateProvider` 方法。The following code example shows how to execute the `CreateProvider` method. 请注意，生成的提供程序可以作为 实例进行访问。Note that the resulting provider is accessed as a instance. [!code-csharp[SqlPersistenceProviderFactory#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sqlpersistenceproviderfactory/cs/sqlpersistenceproviderfactory.cs#7)]

summary.span: 获取使用此工厂创建的永久性提供程序关闭时所用的默认超时值。

The default time-out value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关闭超时的默认值为 15 秒。The default value for close time-out is 15 seconds.

span.span: Locked instances are automatically unlocked after this time period.
The time-out value for lock ownership.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超时值 `TimeSpan.Zero` 指明没有使用锁定。A time-out of `TimeSpan.Zero` specifies that no locking is used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 `LockTimeout` 属性。The following code example shows how to access the `LockTimeout` property. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnAbort() cil managed

summary.span: 表示“中止”阶段。

span.span: Represents the Abort phase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `OnAbort` 关闭服务主机突然关闭时激发和当前正在处理的活动命令。`OnAbort` fires when the service host shuts down abruptly and active commands currently being processed are closed.
